sections.heading: Use
sections.text: of sawdust on floors in retail meat, poultry and fish markets.

sections.heading: Food
sections.text:
establishments which sell alcoholic beverages for consumption on premises

required to post signs concerning birth defects; exception.

sections.heading: Purchase
sections.text:
and use of hemp by operator of food establishment at which food is not prepared

or served for immediate consumption.

sections.heading: Certain
sections.text:
employees of food establishments required to wear hair net or other suitable

covering to confine hair.

sections.heading: Compliance
sections.text: with chapter; powers of health authority.

sections.heading: Exemption
sections.text:
from certain requirements; certain local governing bodies prevented from

prohibiting cottage food operations; registration; fee; inspection.

sections.heading: Exemption
sections.text: from certain requirements; notice to guests.

sections.heading: Prohibited
sections.text:
acts: Operation of food establishment without valid permit issued by health

authority; sale, offer or display for consideration of food prepared in private

home without valid permit issued by health authority; exemptions.

sections.heading: Prohibited
sections.text:
acts: Selling flesh of diseased animal; selling container containing shellfish

without approved stamp.

sections.heading: License
sections.text:
of any licensing authority must not be issued until permit issued by health

authority; exception.

sections.heading: Suspension
sections.text: or revocation of permit; reinstatement of suspended permit; hearing.

sections.heading: Revocation
sections.text:
of city or county business license if permit issued by health authority

revoked.

sections.heading: Access
sections.text: to food establishment; form for inspection report.

sections.heading: Authority
sections.text:
of health authority to require food processing establishment to have food

tested in certain circumstances; requirements of such test; period for

retention of records of tests; reporting of test results.

sections.heading: Food
sections.text: establishment outside jurisdiction of health authority.

sections.heading: Review
sections.text: of plan for construction or remodeling of food establishment.

sections.heading: Procedure
sections.text: if infection of food handler is suspected.

sections.heading: Inapplicability
sections.text: of certain regulations to child care facilities with limited menus.

sections.heading: Restriction
sections.text:
on adoption of regulations concerning construction, maintenance, operation or

safety of building, structure or other property.
